name: Damage Assessment
description:
made for the WAG challenge

A slightly sci-fi themed game. Mechanics are based on common 2D RPG games. You control an operator who does the damage assessment of a space vehicle reported to have been in an accident.

Made using Greenfoot

Images, story, program by VehicleReversing

(programming errors are a possibility, I will correct and update the version if I find a problem)
